00027 #ifndef BZ_INDEXEXPR_H
00028 #define BZ_INDEXEXPR_H
00029 
00030 #include <blitz/tinyvec.h>
00031 #include <blitz/prettyprint.h>
00032 #include <blitz/etbase.h>
00033 #include <blitz/array/domain.h>
00034 #include <blitz/array/slice.h>
00035 
00036 BZ_NAMESPACE(blitz)
00037 
00038 template<int N>
00039 class IndexPlaceholder 
00040 #ifdef BZ_NEW_EXPRESSION_TEMPLATES
00041   : public ETBase<IndexPlaceholder<N> > 
00042 #endif
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     IndexPlaceholder()
00046     { }
00047 
00048 #ifdef BZ_NEW_EXPRESSION_TEMPLATES
00049     IndexPlaceholder(const IndexPlaceholder<N>& x)
00050         : ETBase< IndexPlaceholder<N> >(x)
00051     { }
00052 #else
00053     IndexPlaceholder(const IndexPlaceholder<N>&)
00054     { }
00055 #endif
00056 
00057     ~IndexPlaceholder()
00058     { }
00059 
00060     void operator=(const IndexPlaceholder<N>&)
00061     { }
00062 
00063     typedef int T_numtype;
00064     typedef int T_ctorArg1;     // Dummy; not used
00065     typedef int T_ctorArg2;     // Ditto
00066   typedef int T_range_result; // dummy
00067 
00068     static const int 
00069         numArrayOperands = 0, 
00070         numIndexPlaceholders = 1,
00071         rank = N+1;
00072 
00073     // If you have a precondition failure on this routine, it means
00074     // you are trying to use stack iteration mode on an expression
00075     // which contains an index placeholder.  You must use index 
00076     // iteration mode instead.
00077     int operator*() const { 
00078         BZPRECONDITION(0); 
00079         return 0;
00080     }
00081 
00082 #ifdef BZ_ARRAY_EXPR_PASS_INDEX_BY_VALUE
00083     template<int N_rank>
00084     T_numtype operator()(TinyVector<int, N_rank> i) const { return i[N]; }
00085 #else
00086     template<int N_rank>
00087     T_numtype operator()(const TinyVector<int, N_rank>& i) const { return i[N]; }
00088 #endif
00089 
00090     int ascending(int) const { return INT_MIN; }
00091     int ordering(int)  const { return INT_MIN; }
00092     int lbound(int)    const { return INT_MIN; }  // tiny(int());
00093     int ubound(int)    const { return INT_MAX; }  // huge(int()); 
00094 
00095   RectDomain<rank> domain() const 
00096   { 
00097     const TinyVector<int, rank> lb(lbound(0)), ub(ubound(0));
00098     return RectDomain<rank>(lb,ub);
00099   }
00100 
00101     // See operator*() note
00102 
00103     void push(int)       { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00104     void pop(int)        { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00105     void advance()       { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00106     void advance(int)    { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00107     void loadStride(int) { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00108     template<int N_rank>
00109     void moveTo(const TinyVector<int,N_rank>& i) { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00110 
00111     bool isUnitStride(int) const { 
00112         BZPRECONDITION(0);
00113         return false;
00114     }
00115 
00116     void advanceUnitStride() { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00117 
00118     bool canCollapse(int,int) const {   
00119         BZPRECONDITION(0); 
00120         return false; 
00121     }
00122 
00123     T_numtype operator[](int) const {
00124         BZPRECONDITION(0);
00125         return T_numtype();
00126     }
00127 
00128     T_numtype fastRead(int) const {
00129         BZPRECONDITION(0);
00130         return T_numtype();
00131     }
00132 
00133     diffType suggestStride(int) const {
00134         BZPRECONDITION(0);
00135         return 0;
00136     }
00137 
00138     bool isStride(int,diffType) const {
00139         BZPRECONDITION(0);
00140         return true;
00141     }
00142 
00143   // don't know how to define shift, as it relies on having an
00144   // implicit position. thus stencils won't work
00145   T_numtype shift(int offset, int dim) const
00146   { BZPRECONDITION(0); return T_numtype(); }
00147   T_numtype shift(int offset1, int dim1,int offset2, int dim2) const {
00148     BZPRECONDITION(0); return T_numtype(); }
00149   void _bz_offsetData(sizeType i) { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00150 
00151   // Unclear how to define this, and stencils don't work anyway
00152   T_range_result operator()(RectDomain<rank> d) const
00153   { BZPRECONDITION(0); }
00154 
00155     void prettyPrint(BZ_STD_SCOPE(string) &str, prettyPrintFormat&) const {
00156         // NEEDS_WORK-- do real formatting for reductions
00157         str += "index-expr[NEEDS_WORK]";
00158     }
00159 
00160     template<typename T_shape>
00161     bool shapeCheck(const T_shape&) const { return true; }
00162 
00163   // sliceinfo for index placeholder does nothing
00164   template<typename T1, typename T2 = nilArraySection, 
00165      class T3 = nilArraySection, typename T4 = nilArraySection, 
00166      class T5 = nilArraySection, typename T6 = nilArraySection, 
00167      class T7 = nilArraySection, typename T8 = nilArraySection, 
00168      class T9 = nilArraySection, typename T10 = nilArraySection, 
00169      class T11 = nilArraySection>
00170   class SliceInfo {
00171   public:
00172     static const int new_rank = (N>0) ? ArraySectionInfo<T1>::rank : 0
00173       + (N>1) ? ArraySectionInfo<T2>::rank : 0
00174       + (N>2) ? ArraySectionInfo<T3>::rank : 0
00175       + (N>4) ? ArraySectionInfo<T4>::rank : 0
00176       + (N>5) ? ArraySectionInfo<T5>::rank : 0
00177       + (N>6) ? ArraySectionInfo<T6>::rank : 0
00178       + (N>7) ? ArraySectionInfo<T7>::rank : 0
00179       + (N>8) ? ArraySectionInfo<T8>::rank : 0
00180       + (N>9) ? ArraySectionInfo<T9>::rank : 0
00181       + (N>10) ? ArraySectionInfo<T10>::rank : 0
00182       + (N>11) ? ArraySectionInfo<T11>::rank : 0;
00183     typedef IndexPlaceholder<new_rank> T_slice;
00184   };
00185 
00186     template<typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6,
00187         typename T7, typename T8, typename T9, typename T10, typename T11>
00188     typename SliceInfo<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6,T7,T8,T9,T10,T11>::T_slice
00189     operator()(T1 r1, T2 r2, T3 r3, T4 r4, T5 r5, T6 r6, T7 r7, T8 r8, T9 r9, T10 r10, T11 r11) const
00190     {
00191       // slicing of index placeholders is not implemented. there are
00192       // two problems: First, if you slice the dimension of the index
00193       // placeholder, it should be replaced with a constant. Second,
00194       // if you restrict the range of that dimension, the index
00195       // placeholder should start from a nonzero value.
00196       BZPRECONDITION(0);
00197     }
00198 };

00201 typedef IndexPlaceholder<1> secondIndex;
00202 typedef IndexPlaceholder<2> thirdIndex;
00203 typedef IndexPlaceholder<3> fourthIndex;

00205 typedef IndexPlaceholder<5> sixthIndex;
00206 typedef IndexPlaceholder<6> seventhIndex;
00207 typedef IndexPlaceholder<7> eighthIndex;
00208 typedef IndexPlaceholder<8> ninthIndex;
00209 typedef IndexPlaceholder<9> tenthIndex;
00210 typedef IndexPlaceholder<10> eleventhIndex;
